mapper.insert: INSERT INTO simulation( simu_no, user_id, quota_no, simu_alias, simu_revenue, simu_value ) VALUES ( #{simuNo}, #{userId}, #{quotaNo}, #{simuAlias}, #{simuRevenue}, #{simuValue} )
mapper.select: SELECT simu_no, user_id, simulation.quota_no, companys.company_name, simu_alias, simu_revenue, simu_value FROM simulation JOIN (quota JOIN companys ON quota.company_no = companys.company_no) ON quota.quota_no = simulation.quota_no WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT simu_no, user_id, simulation.quota_no, companys.company_kind, companys.company_name, simu_alias, simu_revenue, simu_value FROM simulation JOIN (quota JOIN companys ON quota.company_no = companys.company_no) ON quota.quota_no = simulation.quota_no WHERE simu_no = #{simuNo}
